jsonBody.name: Rosalind
jsonBody.headline: Ok
jsonBody.pros: Didn‚Äôt eat breakfast

jsonBody.name: Caroline
jsonBody.headline: Leuk hotel in n√≥g leukere buurt8
jsonBody.pros:
Goede ligging in de leuke wijk Covent Garden, die bijna uit zijn voegen barst van gezellige horeca-!gelegenheden en leuke winkeltjes. Bekende attracties zoals musea, House of Parliament met z'n stoere Big Ben, etc., is allemaal gemakkelijk lopend te bezoeken. 
Medewerkers van het hotel is vriendelijk en behulpzaam.
jsonBody.cons: De kamer die wij hadden was van alle gemakken voorzien, maar wel h√©√©l erg klein. Er was nergens een mogelijkheid  om de handdoeken op te hangen.

jsonBody.name: Eva
jsonBody.pros: Emplacement/ gentillesse du personnel
jsonBody.cons: Chambre tres petite

jsonBody.name: Mandy
jsonBody.pros: Location was excellent and the staff were really friendly
jsonBody.cons:
Our room had no window. The bathroom/toilet was just a screen in the room so no privacy. 
I booked via booking.com and it was supposed to include breakfast but when we arrived the guy on reception said breakfast isn‚Äôt included via book.com?

jsonBody.name: Ben
jsonBody.pros: Great location, very helpful staff

jsonBody.name: Andrew
jsonBody.headline: Average
jsonBody.pros: Location
jsonBody.cons: No lift

jsonBody.name: Anonymous
jsonBody.headline: Superb
jsonBody.pros: Location, comfort & cleanliness
jsonBody.cons: Bed too tight - had to crawl in

jsonBody.name: Anonymous
jsonBody.headline: Passable
jsonBody.pros:
Location only
Beds were not comfortable 
No late check out

jsonBody.name: Bruno
jsonBody.headline: Perfect location. Friendly place. Small rooms but reasonably priced.
jsonBody.pros: A great and friendly place in a fantastic location. If you want to enjoy the historic centre and some shows I can‚Äòt think of a better place. Plenty of good restaurants a few steps away. Plus a lovely garden you may use right next to it.
jsonBody.cons: The one limitation is space. No cupboards, very small rooms. You have to live out of your suitcase and if you are 2 to a room you have to close suitcases after use. I guess this is the price for a reasonable room rate in this prime location.

jsonBody.name: Tandy
jsonBody.headline: Great location, expensive for amenities provided
jsonBody.pros: Breakfast was serviceable-staff helpful and friendly
jsonBody.cons: A double bed that can only be accessed from one side isn‚Äôt good

jsonBody.name: Victoria
jsonBody.headline: Perfect location, room very clean with working a/c.
jsonBody.pros: Location was absolutely perfect for our trips to the theatres.
jsonBody.cons: Rooms are so tiny, that is my only criticism of this place! :)

jsonBody.name: Badia
jsonBody.headline: Practical but not magical
jsonBody.pros: Didn‚Äôt have bfast and the location was great
jsonBody.cons: Had to clime stairs to get to my room. Obv the room was super small.

jsonBody.name: Sue
jsonBody.headline: Excellent last minute find.
jsonBody.pros: Location was excellent. Shower was good and the bed was comfy
jsonBody.cons: The tv had limited channels - or I couldn‚Äôt get the tv to work properly. Rooms are small and so no where to  put clothes.

jsonBody.name: Jacqueline
jsonBody.headline: Location location location
jsonBody.pros: Incredible location. Warm welcome & luggage storage. Good breakfast with friendly service. Late checkout time. Very clean throughout.
jsonBody.cons: Although we had the double with a window the room was very small . The bathroom glass screen meant that you had to know your partner well!

jsonBody.name: Irene
jsonBody.headline: Comfy, clean and cool!
jsonBody.pros: Very close to Theatre Royal and all the boutique shops. Quiet and querky- I loved it!
jsonBody.cons: Small but functional with the most amazing staff.

jsonBody.name: Jane
jsonBody.headline: Would definitely go back!
jsonBody.pros: Fantastic location! Great value for money. Booking was easy and hassle free. Rooms were clean and comfortable. Staff were lovely.
jsonBody.cons: Location, very clean. Great location.

jsonBody.name: heatheraU9722ZJ
jsonBody.headline: Cannot recommend
jsonBody.pros: For your hotel stay, the simplest acts of hospitality go a long way. You won‚Äôt get them at the Z Hotel. The company culture is ‚ÄúWe already have your money‚Äîwe don‚Äôt care‚Äù.  It‚Äôs in a great area, but the rooms are wildly small and lacking basic amenities. There is no where to put your bags except in the shower or on your bed. There‚Äôs no closet, no iron for your clothing, no window, no night stand, no outlet in the bathroom. Throughout our stay, the staff never emptied the trash in our room or provided fresh towels.  If you are traveling alone with just a carryon bag and you don‚Äôt mind wrinkled clothes maybe it would be ok for you.

jsonBody.name: Laver
jsonBody.headline: I would stay again.
jsonBody.pros: Excellent location.  Great AC.  Clean.
jsonBody.cons: Breakfast not great for cost.

jsonBody.name: Elise
jsonBody.headline: Superb
jsonBody.pros: Great location! Central to where we wanted to be.

jsonBody.name: Zimmerman
jsonBody.headline: Superb
jsonBody.pros: Staff is amazing and location too
jsonBody.cons: Rooms are very small. It was difficult to move around with 2 people in the room. We only had 2 carry-ons and two small bag packs and had to move things around to open our carry-ons.

jsonBody.name: Anonymous
jsonBody.headline: Very good
jsonBody.pros: Location and friendliness of staff
jsonBody.cons: For the money nothing really

jsonBody.name: Karen
jsonBody.headline: Pleasant
jsonBody.pros: Size of thr room
jsonBody.cons:
Install elevator 
Improve your breakfast

jsonBody.name: Mark
jsonBody.headline: Great place to go to if you are using the room for single use.  For couples I would not recommend.
jsonBody.pros: TV is great.   Staff are good and the hotel is super central to covent garden so thats the biggest plus
jsonBody.cons: The beds, its great for single people but if you are two in the room its quite uncomfortable because of the way the beds are fitted against the wall.  The breakfast is not worth it at all, better go just outside the hotel and take from there.

jsonBody.name: Melek
jsonBody.headline: Passable
jsonBody.pros: It is in the center of the Covent Garden.  Only the location is good.
jsonBody.cons:
The rooms are very small, and it's difficult to move around once you open your luggage.
Room cleaning is not done automatically ‚Äî you need to inform the staff if you want the room to be cleaned.

jsonBody.name: Sian
jsonBody.headline: Superb
jsonBody.pros: Fantastic location, friendly staff and very comfortable room

jsonBody.name: Anita
jsonBody.headline: Superb
jsonBody.pros: Location and balcony on the tip overlooking covent gardens

jsonBody.name: Karen
jsonBody.headline: Exceptional
jsonBody.pros:
Clean. Quiet, location.
Response to left item in room dealt with precision.
Secured and contacted by staff.

jsonBody.name: DarrenL566
jsonBody.headline: Great hotel in a prime location
jsonBody.pros:
Have just spent the night here and what a great location to see the sights of central London. The room was clean and tidy. The hotel were aware it was a birthday and put balloons and a card in the room, with extra towel decorations.
The breakfast was basic but plentiful. Coffee and tea provided throughout the day and evening at no cost.
All the staff we encountered were polite and helpful, from reception team, canteen team to the cleaners.
We will definitely be using this hotel again. Thank you

jsonBody.name: Stuart
jsonBody.headline: You get what you pay for.its clean and great location  definitely no frills
jsonBody.pros: Location
jsonBody.cons: The staff were not knowledgeable about the area

jsonBody.name: Hannah
jsonBody.headline: Nice & comfortable
jsonBody.pros: It‚Äôs a close walking distance to Covent Garden/theatre

jsonBody.name: Claire
jsonBody.headline: Location good, otherwise meh.
jsonBody.pros: Location was excellent
jsonBody.cons: Room was in the basement. Paid extra for a window to look at a wall and railings above us. Bed hard, sheets poor quality, bathroom absolutely tiny so against wall to close shower door, room absolutely tiny, dust on sheets, TV only had radio on it, toilet slow draining, lack of power outlets .

jsonBody.name: Lawrence
jsonBody.headline: If you enjoy being in hub of London then this is the perfect location
jsonBody.pros: Location
jsonBody.cons: Nothing in particular

jsonBody.name: Jasmine
jsonBody.headline: Perfect location to go to the theatre
jsonBody.pros: Amazing location ! Close to many tubes stations

jsonBody.name: joanne662024
jsonBody.headline: Great stay
jsonBody.pros: Our room was compact but had everything we needed and very clean. Luke the manager and all staff were so helpful and friendly. Great location. Will definateley be back.

jsonBody.name: Peter
jsonBody.headline: The basic in a central location
jsonBody.pros: Central good bed
jsonBody.cons: Little privacy in the bathroom

jsonBody.name: Paul
jsonBody.headline: Excellent and will visit again your management and employees are a credit to you look after them üëç
jsonBody.pros:
Excellent staff
Excellent location
Exceptionally clean 

All round fab hotel which we have stayed now a couple of times and will return again the staff cannot do enough for you and are so welcoming and helpful thank you
jsonBody.cons: Nothing all good

jsonBody.name: Bernardo
jsonBody.headline: Clean, tidy and all the bits you need for a comfortable stay. Central location and great service.
jsonBody.pros: Clean, tidy and all the bits you need for a comfortable stay. Central location and great service.
jsonBody.cons: Nothing

jsonBody.name: Adam
jsonBody.headline: CRAMPED, MOLDY BASEMENT THAT COST MORE THAN A FLIGHT TO SPAIN.
jsonBody.pros: STAYEED IN A DAMP MOLDY BASEMENT WITH A ROOM KEY THAT DIDNT WORK. NOT WORTH THE $300 FOR ONE NIGHT
jsonBody.cons: SMALL CRAMPED ROOMS

jsonBody.name: Wendy
jsonBody.headline: Won't go again.
jsonBody.pros: The bed is against the wall, so my partner had to get pasted me in the night to use the toilet. There was also no window in the room. The TV only had 3 channels.

jsonBody.name: Katarzynaw_pl
jsonBody.headline: Good
jsonBody.pros: Localisation. Spacious room. Quiet place. Clean room.

jsonBody.name: Emma
jsonBody.headline: OK Value for money  - very central and in nice location - so would consider booking again
jsonBody.pros: Room had nice view - did not mind size - but bed linen did not seem clean =- I did not have breakfast and location excellent.
jsonBody.cons:
It was a bit tatty around the reception 
lift was not working 
No Iron in my room

jsonBody.name: Benedict
jsonBody.headline: Quick overnight in central London
jsonBody.pros: Great location

jsonBody.name: David
jsonBody.headline: Friendly staff, excellent location - highly recommended.
jsonBody.pros: Excellent location and brilliant staff.
jsonBody.cons: Nothing

jsonBody.name: Andrew
jsonBody.headline: Would be 9 out of 10 if 2 people could stand up in the room at the same time.not even exaggerating, stupidlys
jsonBody.pros: Great location, very modern rooms, very clean, great staff
jsonBody.cons: Room too small to fit a double bed and 2 people. Can‚Äôt walk round the bed so have to climb over the each other to get in and out of bed. Toilet is less than 50cm from the bed separated by a cloudy piece of glass so you can see and hear everything going on in the bathroom when in bed. No where to put your luggage at all, not even space on the floor for it as the space to stand up is so small.  No where to sit except the bed. Ridiculously small room, was a very small single room with a double bed crammed into it.

jsonBody.name: Marina
jsonBody.headline: Exceptional
jsonBody.pros: Great location, small but cozy and very functional room! Would definitelly go back

jsonBody.name: Alison
jsonBody.headline: Exceptional
jsonBody.pros: Quiet and fabulous air conditioning. Breakfast was also a decent price for a London city centre hotel. Very relaxed atmosphere. Wish I was staying more than one night
jsonBody.cons: The life was broken and seemed to be a regular problem

jsonBody.name: Deborah
jsonBody.headline: Great place to stay
jsonBody.pros: Location, staff, cleanliness
jsonBody.cons: One lift

jsonBody.name: Judy
jsonBody.headline: Mum and daughter visit
jsonBody.pros: Amazing location right in the heart of Covent Garden with beautiful parks on doorstep.  Even though the room was quite small it sufficed. Glad we opted for a window. Great shower and comfortable bed.   Staff really friendly and accommodating.  Would definitely visit this location again.
jsonBody.cons: No room around bed on one side (against wall) meaning one guest has to climb over other to use bathroom through the night.  Could have done with some hooks to hang towels.

jsonBody.name: Catherine
jsonBody.headline: Two nights in the city
jsonBody.pros: Awesome location right in the heart of Covent Garden
jsonBody.cons: This is our third time staying at this hotel & unfortunately this time our room was not as comfortable or clean as our previous stays.

jsonBody.name: Luis
jsonBody.headline: Average
jsonBody.pros: Location and  cleaningness.
jsonBody.cons: The small spaces inside the rooms and the lack of communication from room to room

jsonBody.name: Ruth
jsonBody.headline: rooms too small
jsonBody.pros: great location friendly staff great shower roof terrace was good
jsonBody.cons: room was very small and cramped with little storage

jsonBody.name: Donald
jsonBody.headline: Very convenient location and exceptionally friendly staff.
jsonBody.pros:
Did not try the breakfast. Location can‚Äôt be beat. Friendly and helpful staff. 
I will return!
jsonBody.cons: Lifts need to be fixed.

jsonBody.name: Blair
jsonBody.headline: Treating myself to 3 days in London for the galleries and Wimbledon
jsonBody.pros: Great location.  I had a windowed room. It was very hot during my stay but the room was always cool.
jsonBody.cons: The price, but I guess it's the going rate for London.

jsonBody.name: N810IJruthr
jsonBody.headline: very small cramped rooms
jsonBody.pros: The location is fantastic and the real reason for choosing this hotel but the rooms are very small and cramped with no storage space or work surfaces. There was only one double electric socket at the foot end of the bed. We had no room servicing on our 2nd day (we had a 3 night booking )  The staff were friendly but we wont be staying there again as we paid a lot of money for a poor room

jsonBody.name: Marko
jsonBody.headline: In centre of London a little room called "claustrophobia" - especially without window.
jsonBody.pros: The location and staff are great.
jsonBody.cons: Rooms without windows are ---weird - to say at least. And no wardrobe or closet in room.

jsonBody.name: Mullis
jsonBody.headline: The staff was very kind but the bed was extremely uncomfortable and the halls were cluttered with cleaning supplies arou

jsonBody.name: Anonymous
jsonBody.headline: Perfect
jsonBody.pros: Location
jsonBody.cons: No faults

jsonBody.name: Maxine
jsonBody.headline: Very good
jsonBody.pros: Lovely property, perfect and perfect location as well as lovely and helpful staff. Will definitely stay again
jsonBody.cons: Not a fan of the glass toilet door, was more see through they I expected

jsonBody.name: Nick
jsonBody.headline: Done the job
jsonBody.pros: Just what you need for one night
jsonBody.cons: Stairs no lift on one side of building

jsonBody.name: Rowena
jsonBody.headline: An affordable, basic hotel in an excellent location.
jsonBody.pros: The location is excellent, very close to Covent Garden with it's many tourists and flower boxes. The Picadilly Line directly to Heathrow, lots of restaurants and a Tesco's close by. Room is quite basic but workable. Bed was really good - quite firm, serviced well every second day, linen was good.
jsonBody.cons: The TV is accessible only through 'subscriptions'! Not even a basic BBC for international visitors. Internet was patchy, and lost altogether at busy times. Bathroom doesn't have a power point, so hair drying was on top of the small table with kettle etc., with no mirror! No fridge to store small food items on longer stays. Cups/glasses and kettle all squashed on top of the ONLY writing/computing space and power outlet in the room.  Staff were variable - some completely uninterested, some made an effort.

jsonBody.name: The
jsonBody.headline: Great stay close to everything
jsonBody.pros: Very convenient to Covent Garden, the Strand, and so many London sights! We were able to get to the tube easily, go shopping, walk to the Tower of London and Trafalgar square. The rooms were small but well thought out. The blackout shades let us sleep in!
jsonBody.cons: The rooms are small, but this is Central London, so....

jsonBody.name: Phoebe
jsonBody.headline: Location, location, location!
jsonBody.pros: So close to everything, exceptional location, clean and tidy which is all you need in London to base yourself out of for a few days
jsonBody.cons: Being picky, but the pillows were an odd shape and the bed wasn‚Äôt overly comfortable but those things do not outweigh the positives

jsonBody.name: Anonymous
jsonBody.headline: Exceptional
jsonBody.pros: The staff were extremely helpful they couldn't have done anymore.  The room with the private terrace was fantastic we will definitely return
jsonBody.cons: There was nothing I didn't like

jsonBody.name: Rogena
jsonBody.headline: Never again
jsonBody.pros: Nothing
jsonBody.cons: It was teeny tiny - the size of a shoe box - no room to move at all

jsonBody.name: Mindy
jsonBody.headline: excellent stay
jsonBody.pros: The staffers Luke and James were amazing.  I lost my wallet in London and they both helped me with everything.  The best staff ever
jsonBody.cons: first room in the basement was very loud from the furniture in the restaurant above

jsonBody.name: Jennifer
jsonBody.headline: Modern hotel in a great location in the heart of London.
jsonBody.pros: The location was fantastic and the shower fabulous!
jsonBody.cons: Nothing

jsonBody.name: Juliette
jsonBody.headline: Clean, comfortable stay in central London
jsonBody.pros:
Great location, welcoming staff. Easy to get into the hotel after hours.
Clean and functional double room with large ensuite and complimentary shower gel/ shampoo/ tea/ coffee etc.
Great air con and lovely and quiet - especially for such a central location (4th floor room).
Very comfortable (if slightly smaller than expected) double bed.
jsonBody.cons:
I hoped that there would be an option for room service and would have really appreciated additional complimentary toiletries, such as hair conditioner and body lotion, especially in the recent heatwave.
Equally, an iron/ ironing board and additional hanging space/ area to open our suitcases would have been helpful.

jsonBody.name: Roy
jsonBody.headline: Excellent location. Room was very small with last walls on bathroom & no window.
jsonBody.pros: Excellent location
jsonBody.cons: Very small basement room with no window

jsonBody.name: Andy
jsonBody.headline: Very enjoyable
jsonBody.pros: Location and staff great
jsonBody.cons: Room size a little small
